title: Find a Hiding Mimic
description: Located in Waterdeep. A small mimic has taken up residence in Odsel Murnig's antique shop, the White Elephant. While it's kept the rats under control, it has been growing and has started to bite people. It's time for it to leave.

potentialOutcomes.description: A bond is formed between the mimic and the lead agent. Your guild now has a young mimic.
The beast is found and dispatched. Odsel will happily perform cheap appraisals of antiques for the guild.
The mimic is killed but many rare teapots are shattered in the fight.
Lots of rare items were broken, but no mimic was found.
As Failure, the mimic got away. A week later people start disappearing in the shop.

title: Investigate Kraken Rumours
description: The Silverwind Trading Company has been losing ships on a previously prosperous route. They'd like to evaluate rumours of undersea beasts in the area before they update their charts.

potentialOutcomes.description: The Kraken is found and defeated. The guild is now known for its prowess in the sea.
The Kraken is found and defeated, but its remains are too damaged to be useful, even as proof it was a kraken.
The Kraken is found and defeated, but the guild's ship is damaged in the process. It will take an extra week and 200 gold to repair.
The Kraken is found, but the guild's ship is damaged and the kraken escapes. It will take an extra week and 200 gold to repair.
The Kraken is found, but the guild's ship is sunk and the crew must be rescued or take two weeks to return. The guild will lose 700 gold for the ship and 10 reputation.

title: Keep the Peace at a Tavern
description: The Second bell, a local city tavern, has been having trouble with rowdy sports fans and hunters. Folk involved with the mob have been seen, and the owner Jon Blythe wants a strong lawful presence to bring a sense of calm to the place.

potentialOutcomes.description: Jon's daughter, Robyn Blythe, was so impressed that she takes the opportunity to apply with your guild as a level 2 sorcerer.
The pub has turned itself around.
The rowdiest of the clientele now drink elsewhere, but sales have taken a hit.
The atmosphere in the pub has not improved, and Jon has decided to sell up
Your agents have managed to offend Pebbles, a huge dwarven criminal. He vows to return to the pub with his boys to demolish it, before heading to the guild to take revenge.

title: Deliver an Ultimatum
description: Tiefling woman Rieta Wist is having trouble with an ex-boyfriend, Sharius Faith, who will not leave her alone. She feels threatened and wants him scared away.

potentialOutcomes.description: Sharius is scared off permanently, and Rieta spreads word of your guild's effectiveness.
Sharius is scared off, but Rieta remains cautious.
Sharius leaves but vows revenge.
Sharius refuses to leave and escalates the situation.
Sharius retaliates violently, causing damage to the guild's reputation and agents.

finalOutcome.description: Sharius is scared off, but Rieta remains cautious.

title: Find a Kidnapped Construct
description: Clanky the construct has been kidnapped by a rival artificer and Rufus Frummagem needs help retrieving him.

potentialOutcomes.description: Clanky is retrieved unharmed, and Rufus rewards you handsomely.
Clanky is retrieved, but with minor damage.
Clanky is retrieved, but the rival artificer placed a scrying device on it.
Clanky is not retrieved, and Rufus is furious.
Clanky is destroyed, and Rufus spreads word of your failure while demaning you pay for parts to replace him.

finalOutcome.description: Clanky is retrieved, but with minor damage.

title: Deal with Unfavourable Rumours
description: A drunkard has been terrorising the Sweetwater Tavern in a local village for weeks, spreading ill rumors of your company. The drunkard, however, is the nephew of a nearby Duke, and must be dealt with 'delicately.'

potentialOutcomes.description: A ring worth 500gp is gifted to you by the drunkard + 5RP + The drunkard shares the scheduled stops for a supply caravan belonging to an enemy of the party.
Your agents have successfully convinced the drunkard to keep quiet. You are gifted a silver trinket worth 250g.
50gp is taken from the drunkard.
Your agents have lost their temper, publicly thrashing the drunkard.
The Duke is so offended at the way his nephew was treated that he's demanding a meeting with guild leadership!

finalOutcome.description: Your agents have successfully convinced the drunkard to keep quiet. You are gifted a silver trinket worth 250g

title: Distract the City Watch
description: Dwarf crime boss Ogilvie Understone is planning a hit at the central bank of the capital city. He is asking you to assist by drawing the attention of a number of the guards on that night.

potentialOutcomes.description: Ogilvie offers you a favour in return, to be called in whenever.
The Understone robbery goes off without a hitch. Ogilvie is impressed. No reputation loss is suffered.
The Understone robbery goes off with minor trouble from the watch, but one of your Rogues is arrested! Bail will take a week and cost 500gp. Ogilvie pays you 1500gp. -8 RP
There are arrests made at the Understone robbery. 2 Rogues arrested, bail as above per Rogue, -12 RP.
Ogilvie holds you personally responsible, and swears to run you out of town unless your party performs the robbery as planned and delivers the money.

title: Disrupt the Weather Wizards
description: A circle of shadow druids have started brewing up storms up north, putting a shadow over the King's castle. He wishes to see the sun again, and to interrupt the druids' rituals.

potentialOutcomes.description: The king is mighty impressed with your work, granting you an extra 20 reputation in the kingdom! He also provides tickets for Billy Jigglepike's live show.
The sun is shining once again and the druids have been driven out of the city. 2500g + 10 reputation.
The druids are gone, but their spell still lingers. 1250g + 2 reputation.
Some of the druids managed to complete the ritual before being slain, and the king blames you for it. -10 reputation and expenses equal to 10% of initial reward.
One of your agents was turned into a sheep! Find a way to lift the curse.

title: Quell a Cult Uprising
description: The Cult of the Brass Orb have taken up residence in the Quartzstone Caverns and are terrorizing nearby settlements, sacrificing villagers to their god, the demon Tremchuur. Send agents to quell the cultists and rid the region of their evil.

potentialOutcomes.description: During interrogation, the cultists reveal the location of the talisman of Ultimate Evil.
The cultists are slain and scattered. A magic item from Table D is brought back.
The cultists are scattered, but cells are still active. A magic item from Table B is brought back.
The cultists captured your agents and 1000g expenses must be paid to get them back. Word of the cultists is spreading, damaging the guild's reputation.
The cultists have managed to summon Tremchuur, threatening to wreak havoc on the region. Four agents are held hostage as bait.
